name: Quarantined Rapport 3 Wrap-up
description:
Wrap-up presentation for Quarantined Rapport 3

Online tournament supporting Direct Relief's efforts against COVID-19

Feb 19-21 2021

Music: "Westfield" by Nomadikh

Event info: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1E478eKfRRHzn0cWgvgdmkFMkoyb7UV6PWf2LyVgqtko/

** EDIT: Final calculations **

$400 from player entries
$5412 from viewer donations
$1243 in returned winnings
$7055 total for Direct Relief
